title: Installing solar lighting in Malawi Africa

tasks.task: Assembling and installing a solar lighting system on a roof.
subtasks: Connecting the solar panel to crocodile clips.
Attaching crocodile clips to the battery.
Connecting the bulbs to the battery.
Positioning the solar panel on the roof.
